author: Lauren Yapalater
title: Leonardo DiCaprio Had His Meat Salted By Salt Bae
text:
View this image ›
giphy.com ID: 10450029 3. Well my friends, here is a pic of salt bae doing his salt thing… FOR LEONARDO DICAPRIO. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @nusr_et ID: 10449948 4. YES, HI LEO. View this image ›
Lauren Yapalater / Via Instagram: @nusr_et ID: 10450038 5. It was posted by Salt bae guy himself. View this image ›
Instagram: @nusr_et ID: 10449961 6. And in it Leo is looking like he can’t even friggen believe salt bae is salting his shit right in front of his very eyes!!! View this image ›
Instagram: @nusr_et ID: 10449968 7. Leo is shook to his core! View this image ›
Instagram: @nusr_et ID: 10449973 8. It’s intense!! View this image ›
instagram.com ID: 10449980 9. And as if things weren’t crazy enough…there’s a toothpick in Leo’s mouth. A toothpick for cryin’ out loud!!! View this image ›
Instagram: @nusr_et ID: 10449985 10. Anyway, there you have it. A picture of salt bae dude salting Leonardo DiCaprio’s meat. View this image ›
instagram.com ID: 10449991 11. I don’t know what this happened and I don’t care. Just glad it did. ID: 10449992 Leonardo Dicaprio
